name: Big Dev Blog
body:
# Jordan Crabtree
## Salt Lake City

Software Engineer at [weave](http://www.getweave.com/).

### Current Endeavors
- I am working towards a thorough understanding of Python.
- I am learning as much as possible about machine learning and big data.
- I am committed to finding creative solutions to difficult problems.

### Sincere thanks
to my current mentors and friends Clint Berry (@clintberry) and Tyson Phalp (@tphalp).

### Just a few links
- [Beehive Startups](http://beehivestartups.com/)
- [Hacker News](http://news.ycombinator.com/)
- [Electronic Frontier Foundation](https://www.eff.org/)
- [Richard Stallman](http://stallman.org/)
